ATTITUDE Oceanly Phyto-Calm Face Serum

Brand: ATTITUDE

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Propanediol, glycerin, aqua/water/eau, sodium stearate, fucus vesiculosus (bladderwrack) extract, glycogen, caprylhydroxamic acid, glyceryl caprylate

Directions: Push up tube. Apply to cleansed and lightly dried face and massage into skin until absor

nto skin until absorbtion. Use before your face cream. Can be used day and night.

Warnings: Store at a temperature below 90 F. Avoid contact of the packaging with water. FOR EXTERNAL USE ONLY.
